Beginner Vocabulary

Beginner Vocabulary

Welcome to our comprehensive beginner vocabulary section! We've organized 108 essential English words into 9 easy-to-manage pages with 12 words each. These words are the foundation of English communication and will help you build confidence in everyday conversations.

How to Use This System

Each vocabulary page contains:

  • 12 carefully selected words with pronunciation guides
  • Clear definitions and example sentences
  • Word categories (greetings, family, colors, etc.)
  • Easy navigation between pages

Vocabulary Pages

Page 1

Greetings & Basics
Hello, Goodbye, Please, Thank you, Yes, No, Water, Food, House, School, Family, Friend

Page 2

Emotions & Descriptions
Happy, Sad, Big, Small, Good, Bad, Hot, Cold, Cat, Dog, Car, Bus

Page 3

Objects & Activities
Book, Phone, Computer, Money, Work, Sleep, Eat, Drink, Walk, Run, Read, Write

Page 4

Time & Dates
Time, Day, Night, Morning, Evening, Today, Tomorrow, Yesterday, Week, Month, Year, Hour

Page 5

Colors & Numbers
Red, Blue, Green, Black, White, Yellow, One, Two, Three, Four, Five, Ten

Page 6

Family & People
Mother, Father, Brother, Sister, Child, Baby, Man, Woman, Boy, Girl, Person, People

Page 7

Essential Verbs
Love, Like, Want, Need, Have, Get, Give, Take, Make, Do, Go, Come

Page 8

Body Parts & Identity
Head, Hand, Eye, Mouth, Foot, Leg, Arm, Face, Hair, Name, Age, Job

Page 9

Questions & Descriptions
Here, There, Where, What, When, Why, How, Who, New, Old, Nice, Beautiful

Learning Tips

  1. Start with Page 1 and work through each page systematically
  2. Learn 3-4 words per day for steady progress
  3. Practice with example sentences to understand context
  4. Review previous pages regularly to reinforce learning
  5. Use the words in conversations as much as possible

Connect Your Learning

Grammar Topics to Practice With

  • Present Simple Tense - Use these vocabulary words in basic sentences
  • Subject Pronouns - Learn to use these words with "I," "you," "he," "she"
  • Articles - Practice using "a," "an," and "the" with vocabulary words

Stories That Use These Words

  • My Daily Routine - See beginner vocabulary in context
  • A Day at School - Practice everyday vocabulary
  • Shopping at the Store - Learn shopping vocabulary
